00020 #ifndef __TLM_MASTER_SLAVE_IFS_H__
00021 #define __TLM_MASTER_SLAVE_IFS_H__
00022 
00023 #include "tlm_core/tlm_1/tlm_req_rsp/tlm_1_interfaces/tlm_core_ifs.h"
00024 
00025 namespace tlm {
00026 
00027 //
00028 // req/rsp combined interfaces
00029 //
00030 
00031 // blocking
00032 
00033 template < typename REQ , typename RSP>
00034 class tlm_blocking_master_if :
00035   public virtual tlm_blocking_put_if< REQ > ,
00036   public virtual tlm_blocking_get_peek_if< RSP > {};
00037 
00038 template < typename REQ , typename RSP>
00039 class tlm_blocking_slave_if :
00040   public virtual tlm_blocking_put_if< RSP > ,
00041   public virtual tlm_blocking_get_peek_if< REQ > {};
00042 
00043 // nonblocking
00044 
00045 template < typename REQ , typename RSP >
00046 class tlm_nonblocking_master_if :
00047   public virtual tlm_nonblocking_put_if< REQ > ,
00048   public virtual tlm_nonblocking_get_peek_if< RSP > {};
00049 
00050 template < typename REQ , typename RSP >
00051 class tlm_nonblocking_slave_if :
00052   public virtual tlm_nonblocking_put_if< RSP > ,
00053   public virtual tlm_nonblocking_get_peek_if< REQ > {};
00054 
00055 // combined
00056 
00057 template < typename REQ , typename RSP >
00058 class tlm_master_if :
00059   public virtual tlm_put_if< REQ > ,
00060   public virtual tlm_get_peek_if< RSP > ,
00061   public virtual tlm_blocking_master_if< REQ , RSP > ,
00062   public virtual tlm_nonblocking_master_if< REQ , RSP > {};
00063 
00064 template < typename REQ , typename RSP >
00065 class tlm_slave_if :
00066   public virtual tlm_put_if< RSP > ,
00067   public virtual tlm_get_peek_if< REQ > ,
00068   public virtual tlm_blocking_slave_if< REQ , RSP > ,
00069   public virtual tlm_nonblocking_slave_if< REQ , RSP > {};
00070 
00071 } // namespace tlm
00072 
00073 #endif
